body:
-vd works well. However -b kbinSE, error:


C:\Users\Urtza\Desktop\AIE50\CFS>perl c:/radiance/bin/genklemsamp.pl -vd
0.70 -0
  .70 0 objects/window.rad | rcontrib -c 1000 -e MF:4 -f reinhart.cal -b
rbin -bn
  Nrbins -m sky_glow after_dmx.oct > results/south.dmx
/(Works)/
 
  C:\Users\Urtza\Desktop\AIE50\CFS>rcontrib -f
c:/radiance/lib/klems_full.cal -b k
  bin(0.7,-0.7,0 0,0,1) -bn Nkbins -m windowglow -I+ -ab 2 -ad 512 -lw 2e-5
after_
  vmx.oct < after.pts > results/photocellsRotated45.vmx
  rcontrib: fatal - missing required modifier argument






"Guglielmetti, Robert" <Robert.Guglielmetti at nrel.gov> escribió:


> Er, "0.7 -0.7 0.0" is correct. What you have there is correct. So what's
> going on for you?
>
> On 5/27/15, 8:54 AM, "Guglielmetti, Robert"
<Robert.Guglielmetti at nrel.gov>
